name: SOULCALIBUR VI - DLC2: 2B
detailed_description:
Joining the cast of SOULCALIBUR VI is the combat android 2B (YoRHa No. 2 Type B) from Square Enix's NieR: Automata! With elegant moves reproduced from the original game, she can team up with her support unit, Pod 042, to launch long-range attacks and coordinated assaults! Jump and dash around your opponent to pull off swift attacks and deadly air combos!

DLC Content:
- 2B (YoRHa No. 2 Type B) as a playable character
- An additional outfit set
- An additional weapon set
- An additional song: "City Ruins: Soul (NieR: Automata)"
- An additional stage: "City Ruins: Eternal Apocalypse"
- Additional titles
- Additional battle comments

short_description: Joining the cast of SOULCALIBUR VI is the combat android 2B (YoRHa No. 2 Type B) from Square Enix's NieR: Automata! Jump and dash around your opponent to pull off swift attacks and deadly air combos!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Процессор: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz or equivalent
  • Оперативная память: 6 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Версии 11
  • Звуковая карта: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Процессор: Intel Core i5-4690 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Оперативная память: 8 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Версии 11
  • Звуковая карта: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
